 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתַל‎</span>] **verb** ==transplant== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁתַל‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Vulgar Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***plant***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slip, cutting***, [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]] (loan-words ?) [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]<sup>1488</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šitlu***</u></abbr> apparently = ***shoot, slip***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתַ֫לְתִּי‎</span> [[Ezek.17.22|Ezek 17:22]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁתֳּלֶנּוּ‎</span> v[[Ezek.17.23|Ezek 17:23]] ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁתוּל‎</span> [[Jer.17.8|Jer 17:8]] = [[Ps.1.3|Ps 1:3]], etc. (8 t.); — ***transplant*** (poetry): tree or vine, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location, [[Ezek.17.10|Ezek 17:10]]; [[Ezek.17.23|Ezek 17:23]]; [[Ezek.19.13|Ezek 19:13]]; [[Ps.92.14|Ps 92:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמַֿיִם‎</span> [[Ezek.19.10|Ezek 19:10]]; [[Jer.17.8|Jer 17:8]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפַּֿלְגֵי מִיִם‎</span> [[Ps.1.3|Ps 1:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿר‎</span> [[Ezek.17.22|Ezek 17:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלמַֿיִם‎</span> v[[Ezek.17.8|Ezek 17:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְצוֺר שְׁתוּלָה בְנָוֶה֑‎</span> [[Hos.9.13|Hos 9:13]] is corrupt [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] (both in translation) [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] Harper <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָצַ֫יִד שָׁתוּ בָנָיו‎</span> (or the like; somewhat differently [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]) Ephraim ... ***for a prey have they set his sons.***
